title: ZeroG Belt: Control Your Body Weight

beats.text: What if you could reduce your body weight to just one-sixth — with the push of a button? Meet the ZeroG Belt: the first wearable that lets you control how heavy you feel.
beats.imagePrompt: Distance view of a yound guy with T-shirt and jeans wearing a ZeroG Belt, standing in a green field of a park in a city. There are some high-rise buildings in the background.
beats.moviePrompt: He jumpst straight up about 30 feet as if he is on the moon.

beats.text: The ZeroG Belt lets you reduce your weight — from full body weight to as little as one-sixth — simulating low gravity conditions like the Moon.
beats.imagePrompt: Side view of a person walking on the city street with the belt on his waist.

beats.text: Need to climb stairs? Carry groceries? Just dial down your weight and move like never before. Everyday tasks become effortless.
beats.imagePrompt: An old woman wearing a ZeroG Belt, is holidng several groceries bags standing in front of a long stairs of a train station.

beats.text: It’s also perfect for rehab, recovery, or supporting mobility in older adults. Less strain on joints, more freedom to move.
beats.imagePrompt: Elderly person walking confidently in a park, wearing the ZeroG Belt, aided gently by low-gravity motion.

beats.text: Kids love it too. It makes playtime feel like spacewalking — fun, safe, and unforgettable.
beats.imagePrompt: Athletes jumping high and laughing in a playground, wearing glowing ZeroG Belts.

beats.text: Powered by compact weight modulation tech, the ZeroG Belt uses precision sensors and real-time feedback to keep you in control.
beats.imagePrompt: Exploded diagram of the belt showing tech components: sensors, gyros, actuators, and microcontroller.

beats.text: Designed for daily life, it's safe, stylish, and easy to use. Charge it like a smartphone, wear it like a belt.
beats.imagePrompt: Person putting the belt on in front of a mirror like a fashion accessory, modern and minimal look.

beats.text: ZeroG Belt: Turn down gravity. Unlock your potential. Available now for pre-order.
beats.imagePrompt: Bold product shot of ZeroG Belt glowing in a dramatic lighting setup, with slogan text: 'Gravity, Optional.'
